name: Don't Shoot The Squares
description:
This is the first game I've made just to get into the practice of making and releasing games. Don't expect anything fancy.

HOW TO PLAY

- Use WASD to move.

- Use ARROW keys to shoot.

- There will be various shapes that spawn throughout the game.

- Squares do not harm you and will move through you. However, if you shoot a square, you die.

- Circles will kill you if you collide with one.

- Triangles will shoot smaller triangles towards you which will kill you on impact. Also, you will die if you collide with regular-sized triangles.

- You can shoot triangles and circles to earn points, but not squares.

Enjoy! (or not)
